name: Too Cute for Space Fights
description:
You are a versatile, state of the art astromech droid.
You were built to serve, to repair, to defend, to aid in battle.
You are a warrior's right hand. Your human friend trusts you with their life.

It all sounds glorious on paper...  

As far as *you're* concerned, you're just too damn cute for space fights.  

But you're gonna do your best to delay the inevitable!

—

Controls
  •  W-A-S-D/Arrows, Z, X
  •  Watch the on-screen hints!
Issues

Might not work in Safari. Please try another browser.
